briefTitle: Effects of a Dexmedetomidine on Quality of Recovery 40 and Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting in Breast Cancer Surgery
officialTitle: Effects of a Single Dose Dexmedetomidine on Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting (PONV) and Quality of Recovery 40 (QoR 40) in Breast Cancer Surgery
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ASA I, II
* aged 20-70 years
* Undergoing breast cancer surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* CAOD
* Bradycardia
* QT prolongation
